summary:
Update: If you were wondering why the sword did not look that great I found out why. I was in a hurry when I uploaded that I neglected to set the shader to environment mapping and a few of the texture paths were wrong.

A complete retexture of LeanWolf’s skinny version of the Nightingale Blade and scabbard from the Thief’s Guild que
descriptionHtml:
Update:  The bow and sword can both be downloaded at [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89076]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89076[/url]

[b][u][color=#ff0000]What is it?[/color][/u][/b]

A complete retexture of LeanWolf's skinny version of the Nightingale questline weapon. I darkened the blade and the reflections to better fit with the night blade theme and gave the sword a new black leather grip. I smoothed out the normal of the blade portion to give it a more polished look and added a Damascus type pattern to the reflection maps. I also added a nice stingray skin wrap around the base of the blade for quiet sheathing.

I also took the texture for Tamriel’s smaller moon, Secunda, and replaced the inscription on the guard of the hilt. I added a shimmering glow that resembles a lunar eclipse that can be seen from certain angles. 

As as an optional download I am adding three possible textures to the files section so that you can decide which sword you want to use. The three files will represent the three main choices you make when you finish the questline and will determine which type of moon symbol is on the weapon.  Full moon is Strife, half moon is subterfuge, and crescent moon is stealth.

The 2 optional versions will be released soon.  It is late and I just wanted to get this published tonight.

LeanWolfs mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39870]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39870[/url]
author: Cain9580
